import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import paypal from "../../assests/images/paypal.png"; import checkout from "../../assests/images/checkout.png"; //price summary product function PriceSummary(props: any) { const totolPrice = useSelector((state: any) => state.getProductList.totolPrice); // return component return (
); } export default PriceSummary;
